mdx.excerpt: Combo nodes provide helpers to apply Cost Gameplay Effects and list of Gameplay Effects to apply to targets in what is commonly called Gameplay Effectâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Gameplay Effects (Cost and Containers)
frontmatter.description: Learn more how you can apply damages or other gameplay effects when a hit is registered. We'll also explain how you can define a cost GameplayEffect for each combo nodes.
